numb.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a part of your body that is numb is unable to feel anything, for example because you are very cold
numb.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: My fingers were so numb I could hardly write.
The anaesthetic made his whole face go numb.
numb.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: unable to think, feel, or react in a normal way
numb.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: I just sat there, numb with fear.
numb.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to make someone unable to feel pain or feel things they are touching
numb.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The cold had numbed her fingers.
the numbing effect of the drug
